TABLE.NAME: findpartner
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the findpartner activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

FIELD.NAME: minmembers
FIELD.COMMENT: Minimum of members that a group can have

FIELD.NAME: maxmembers
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum of members that a group can have

FIELD.NAME: dateclosuregroups
FIELD.COMMENT: Deadline for students to make groups. When the time comes, the groups get automatically fulfill

TABLE.NAME: proyectgroup
TABLE.COMMENT: This is the table of the group.

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: A short description of the group.

FIELD.NAME: groupadmin
FIELD.COMMENT: The admin of the group (who is an student).

TABLE.NAME: student
TABLE.COMMENT: This table contains all the students of the course and his/her group.

FIELD.NAME: studentgroup
FIELD.COMMENT: The student belongs to this group.

TABLE.NAME: request
TABLE.COMMENT: A student send a request to a group to join.

FIELD.NAME: student
FIELD.COMMENT: The student who wants to join the group.

FIELD.NAME: proyectgroup
FIELD.COMMENT: The group who is asked for the student to get in.
